wordpressPage.title: Scotland
wordpressPage.content:
Windmill Christian Centre – East Coast of Scotland – Website

The Windmill centre is a residential centre situated on the East Coast of Scotland and can sleep up to 60 people. The centre includes a number of facilities including meeting rooms and a games room. They offer a range of pricing depending on time and length of stay so check their website for full information.

Whithaugh Park – Scottish Borders – Website

Whithaugh Park is a residential centre run by Rock UK who run several residential centres throughout the UK. Whithaugh Park offers a range of residential options for youth groups with plenty of activities on offer. For full information check their website

The Abernethy Trust – Website

The Abernethy Trust have 4 centres across Scotland that offer adventure activities. These are in Ardeonaig, Ardour, Barcaple and Nethybridge. Please visit their website for more details.

The Atholl Centre, Highlands – Website

A self catering centre in the Highlands. Please visit their website for more details.

Compass Centre, Cairngorm National Park – Website

A well established centre for schools and groups which offers a variety of activities. Please visit their website for more details.

Glencoe Outdoor Centre, Glencoe – Website

A centre in Glencoe near the river Coe which offers a variety of activities. Please visit their website for more details.

Rock UK, Whithaugh Park – Website

The Rock UK centre near the Scottish Borders offering a variety of activities. Please visit their website for more details.

Scripture Union Scotland, various – Website

Scripture Union Scotland has a number of residential centres across Scotland. Please visit their website for more details.

Teen Ranch – Perthshire – Website

A centre which can cater for up to sixty-eight campers offering a variety of activities. Please visit their website for more details.
